H0.text: Growing and reproducing are the two life processes that occur in both plants and humans.

H1.text: Germinating and making food are the two life processes that occur in both plants and humans.

H2.text: Growing and making food are two life processes that occur in both plants and humans.

H3.text: Germinating and reproducing are the two life processes that occur in both plants and humans.

A4.text: Growth from any such meristem at the tip of a root or shoot is termed primary growth and results in the lengthening of that root or shoot.

A5.text: A vascular plant begins from a single celled zygote, formed by fertilisation of an egg cell by a sperm cell.
